hero.title: We Design Luxury
hero.subtitle: Transforming your spaces into masterpieces that reflect your refined taste

about.title: Creating Exceptional Spaces Since 2010
about.description: We are an interior design studio specializing in creating luxurious spaces that combine modern elegance with ultimate comfort. We believe every space tells a unique story.
about.philosophy: Our philosophy is based on the harmonious blend of premium natural materials and contemporary design, while preserving our clients' cultural identity.

services.title: Comprehensive Design Solutions
services.subtitle: We offer a complete range of interior design services to meet all your needs

interior.title: Interior Design
interior.description: Luxurious interior design for villas, apartments, and palaces using the latest global styles

consultation.title: Consultation
consultation.description: Specialized consultation in selecting colors, materials, and appropriate furniture

execution.title: Execution & Supervision
execution.description: Complete supervision on project execution to ensure the highest quality standards

furniture.title: Furniture Design
furniture.description: Custom furniture design that reflects your personality and refined taste

lighting.title: Lighting Design
lighting.description: Innovative lighting solutions that create the perfect atmosphere for your spaces

landscape.title: Landscape Design
landscape.description: Outdoor spaces and gardens design that complement the beauty of interior design

gallery.title: Projects We're Proud Of
gallery.subtitle: Discover our latest projects that showcase our creativity and excellence

contact.title: Let's Turn Your Vision Into Reality
contact.subtitle: We're here to answer your questions and discuss your next project

footer.description: Designing exceptional spaces that combine luxury and comfort for over a decade.
